title: The Musical cartoon show. Vol. 02
brief_description: Presented with “Bold King Cole” (1936), starring the mischievous cartoon character Felix the Cat, are a selection of other cartoons from that by-gone-era of the 30s. All presented here are from Castle Films or directed, produced by the now legendary Ub Iwerks; Max and Dave Fleischer. Sit back and enjoy: “Happy days”, “Musical memories”, “The Pincushion man”, “The Wee men”, “A King’s Tailor” and the well-known fairy tale, “Jack and the beanstalk.”
